{{Disambiguation}}

'''Grass''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{BlockLink|Short Grass}}, a non-solid block that spawns abundantly in the Overworld, formerly known as "Grass".
** {{BlockLink|Tall Grass}}, its tall variant.
* {{BlockLink|Grass Block}}, a block with grass on top of it.
* {{BlockLink|Dirt Path}}, a path block used for villages, formerly known as "Grass Path".
* {{BlockLink|Seagrass}}, a sea variant.
** {{BlockLink|Tall Seagrass}}, a tall seagrass variant.
** {{BlockLink|Seagrass (feature)|id=seagrass}}, a feature which generates seagrass.
* {{BlockLink|Short Dry Grass}}, a desert variant of grass.
** {{BlockLink|Tall Dry Grass}}, its tall variant.
* {{BlockLink|Fern}}, a non-solid block found only in certain biomes.
** {{BlockLink|Large Fern}}, a 2-block tall fern.
* {{BlockLink|Bush}}, a non-solid block with a similar texture as short grass.
* {{BlockLink|Firefly Bush}}, a variant of the bush.
